paragraph.en: Bacon ipsum dolor amet short ribs ribeye swine cow buffalo spare ribs picanha.  Chicken pastrami beef, pork ham hock drumstick pork loin.
paragraph.sm: O le gagana faasamoa lenei, ua sui a'e ai le gagana faaperetania. O le gagana faasamoa lenei, ua sui a'e ai le gagana faaperetania.

title.sm: Ua uma ona sauni sau item?

paragraph.en: Upload your item here! Please RSVP before uploading your item. We will be reviewing all items prior to the evening. If you are unable to submit your item here, please contact us for assistance.
paragraph.sm: Faaulu mai lau item i le itulau lenei! Faamolemole resitala muamua (RSVP) a o le’i tuuina I luga (upload) lau item. O le a siakiina uma items a o le’i oo i le aso o le fiafia. Pe afai e le'i mafai ona lafo mai lau item e ala i lenei upega tafa'ilagi, faamolemole fesoota'i mai mo le fesoasoani.

title.sm: O le a le uiga o le upu fiafia?

paragraph.en: The word fiafia is derived from the Samoan language, which means happy or happiness. A fiafia night means an evening of entertainment!
paragraph.sm: O le upu fiafia e fesootai atu I le ‘ata, lagona faamalieina ma le olioli o le loto ma le mafaufau. O le po fiafia la, o lona uiga o se afiafi o faafiafiaga lea e maua mai ai le ‘ata ma evaevaga e faafouina ai.
